headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Island Riches
content:
Cayo Perico, a private party island of blue skies and tropical highs – and also home to one of the world’s most notorious drug lords. If you can find a way to breach the island’s defenses and evade the heavily armed guards stationed there, you could be set up for life.

Choose your tools. Choose your approach. Choose your crew – or even go it entirely alone. Just make it back to Los Santos in one piece.
